name: KX! Dusttale v3
description:
PC CONTROLS: WASD or Arrows for Soul Movement

7 For INF Health Mode

F for Shield

XBOX Controls: 

Right Joystick = Mouse Cursor

RT for Press or Click for mouse Cursor

Y for Infinite Health Mode

B for Shield

LB For Start

RB for Credits

DPAD / Left Joystick for Soul Movement

PLAYSTATION CONTROLS:

Right Joystick = Mouse Cursor

RT for Press or Click for mouse Cursor

Y for Infinite Health Mode

B for Shield

L1 For Start

R1 for Credits

Touch Pad / Left Joystick for Soul Movement
